Title: Relates to exempting from sales and use tax school buses
Summary: Exempts school buses and parts, equipment, lubricants and fuel purchased and used in their operation from sales and use tax; establishes a green ribbon panel to research and report on greener school buses.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting from sales and use tax school buses; establishes a green ribbon panel to research greener school buses
